content:
Yeah, I've been riding my bike regularly since the repair, and it's been feeling great. The shifting is smooth, and the braking is responsive. I'm glad I got it fixed when I did.

You know, speaking of maintenance, I've been meaning to ask: do you know anything about selling cars online? I'm trying to sell my old motorcycle, a Yamaha FZ6R, on Craigslist, and I'm not sure what kind of photos I should take or what kind of information I should include in the listing.
